SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.login_name, t.`name`, t.`password`, t.salt, t.sex, t.phone, t.email, t.user_type, t.`status`, t.expired, t.enterprise_id, t.department_id, t.job_id, t.is_leader, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.`password` AS userPwd, t3.id AS roleId, t3.`name` AS roleName, t3.description AS roleDescription, t3.seq AS roleSeq, t3.`status` AS roleStatus, t5.enterprise_name as enterpriseName, t6.department_name as departmentName, t7.job_name as jobName FROM t_sys_user t LEFT JOIN t_sys_user_role t2 ON t.id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_role t3 ON t2.role_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_user_token t4 on t.id=t4.user_id LEFT JOIN t_enterprise t5 on t.enterprise_id=t5.id LEFT JOIN t_enterprise_department t6 on t.department_id=t6.id LEFT JOIN t_enterprise_job t7 on t.job_id=t7.id
t.id=#{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT rm.resource_id FROM t_sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_resource rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
